縗字的基本解释

縗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cuī］
［《廣韻》倉回切，平灰，清。］
“缞1”的繁体字。
旧时丧服。用麻布条披于胸前。服三年之丧（臣为君、子为父、妻为夫）者用之。

縗字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縗； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页933第37
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?倉回切，音崔。【說文】服衣長六寸，博四寸，直心。【玉篇】喪服也。【左傳·襄十七年】晏嬰麤縗斬。【註】縗，在胷前。【釋文】縗，本又作衰。　又【集韻】雙隹切，音榱。鷺首毛。　又【集韻】蘇回切，音?。編鷺羽爲衣。　又【集韻】蘇何切，音蓑。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [cuī]
["Guangyun" Canghui cut, flat gray, clear. ]
Traditional characters for "缞1".
Old mourning clothes. Put a strip of burlap on the chest. It is used for those who serve a three-year funeral (the minister is the emperor, the son is the father, and the wife is the husband).
缞

[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　缞; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 933-37
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Cang Hui cut, Yin Cui. [Said the text] The clothes are six inches long, four inches long, and straight-hearted. 【Jade articles】Mourning clothes are also. [Zuo Zhuan·Xiangsu Seventeenth Year] Yan Ying cuts rough. [Note] 缞, in front of the nap. [Explanation] 缞, the original is bad again.　[Jiyun] Double 隹 cut, sound 榱. Heron head hair.　[Jiyun] Su Huiqie again, sound?. Weave heron feathers as clothing.　[Jiyun] Su Heqie, Yin Min. The same meaning.
